titleStmt.title: The lovers mad fits and fancies to a delightful new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, W. Gilbertson and J. Wright,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Right half sheet contains: "the second part to the same tune."
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
